questionsList.question: What type of long term memory is stored with reference to contextual information, eg time and place
What type of long term memory is difficult to describe in words
What type of long term memory is associated with knowing the meaning of a word
Which factor affecting minority influence is illustrated by the following example: Members of a religious group give up their Saturday mornings to distribute leaflets about the importance of worship.

Which factor affecting minority influence is illustrated by the following example: An environmental group acknowledges that recycling can be time-consuming while emphasising its importance for the future of the planet.
Which factor affecting minority influence is illustrated by the following example: All of the members of the ‘Flat Earth Society’ agree that the Earth is flat and not round.
Which factor affecting minority influence is illustrated by the following example: All of the members of the ‘Flat Earth Society’ agree that the Earth is flat and not round.
